title: Refund Item
description: A refund associated with an order that defines the type of refund, the amount and the associated currency.

xdm:transactionID.title: Transaction ID
xdm:transactionID.description: The unique transaction identifier for this refund item.

xdm:refundReason.title: Refund Reason
xdm:refundReason.description: Reason why a refund was issued. Enumerated.

xdm:refundPaymentType.title: Refund Payment Type
xdm:refundPaymentType.description: The method of payment for this order. Enumerated, custom values allowed.

xdm:currencyCode.title: Currency Code
xdm:currencyCode.description: The ISO 4217 currency code used for this refund item.
